turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Like to order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want four medium pizzas all on gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one meat lovers, one supreme, one onion pepperoni bacon and extra cheese, and one with extra pepperoni, extra sausage, and green peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that bella luna's charges for extra ingrediants, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 medium gluten free crust pizzas, 1 meatlovers, 1 supreme, 1 onion, pepperoni, bacon, and extra cheese, 1 extra pepperoni, extra sausage, and green peppers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Can you add extra sauce to all of them, as well?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, so for all 4 pizzas gluten free crust and extra sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, your total will be $80, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, it works.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pickup, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That's all I needed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Will do.
